format: TypeScript with Vue.js (specifically a test file for Vue components)
description: This file is a test specification for the Vue.js component 'HelloWorld.vue'. It uses Vitest as the testing framework and '@vue/test-utils' to mount and test the component's rendering.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines a test case that checks if the HelloWorld component renders properly.

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
